title: World Series Logo Font?
content:
2008 World Series Logo

I realize that this font is tooled a bit, but what’s the serif font they’re using to spell out “World Series?” I’d appreciate any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091108153159im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2008ws_5884.jpg)
author: IronTaco
